# File lib/activerdf_sparql/sparql_result_parser.rb, line 11
11:   def tag_start(name, attrs)
12:                 case name
13:                 when 'variable'
14:       @vars << attrs['name']
15:                 when 'result'
16:       @current_result = []
17:                 when 'binding'
18:       @index = @vars.index(attrs['name'])
19:                 when 'bnode', 'literal', 'typed-literal', 'uri'
20:       @current_type = name
21:     end
22:   end
